course_title: Special Topics: Content Marketing Digital Age

class_notes: We live in a noisy world -- the average person encounters 6,000-10,000 ads in a single day, 27M pieces of content are published daily and our attention spans have perfected the art of tuning out. Whether you are a marketer communicating to consumers, an entrepreneur to investors or a consultant to a client, story is the greatest tool you have to break through the noise. This course teaches the elements of powerful stories and "sticky" ideas. The foundation elements of the course will then allow us to examine the Core Creative Idea (CCI) of brands like Peloton and how that CCI is applied on platforms of the digital age including podcasts, email marketing, influencers and TikTok.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
